description:
Tucked away on a no-through road within a coveted Kew pocket, bordered by the Kew and Green Acres golf clubs, with Willesmere Park, the Kew Billabong and the Yarra all within a relaxed stroll and Kew’s schools, shopping and restaurant options just across the bridge this lavish multi-level home offers a truly low maintenance, luxurious, lock and leave lifestyle!

Behind a distinctive façade, artfully blending stacked stone, brick and rendered surfaces, the well-laid-out interior showcases a similarly impressive attention to detail. Stone finishes and matt black fixtures and fittings feature in the Smeg equipped gourmet kitchen, fitted laundry, and the fully tiled guest powder room, family bathroom (freestanding bath and dual head shower) serving three of the four bedrooms and the sumptuous ensuite within the main bedroom.

Finished with timber floors and integrating the deluxe chef’s kitchen, the expansive open-plan living stretches out through a wall of glass sliders to a private deck that provides a peaceful sanctuary for relaxed outdoor enjoyment!

Offering a welcome bonus for today’s modern living, a spacious open study provides plenty of space to meet the needs of those working from home, or alternatively would work as a sitting area if desired. The oversized double garage introduces the all-weather ease and convenience of internal access and further storage options.

Sure to make life easy are further enhancements, including double-glazed windows, video entry, NBN connection, plumbed fridge cavity, timber floors to the study/sitting area, quality carpets to all four bedrooms, fitted walk-in and built-in robes to the main and the year-round comfort of ducted refrigerated climate control.

***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS***
